text: I Am Cuba (; , Ya Kuba) is a 1964 anthology drama movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov. The movie was Soviet-Cuba and was not popular in both countries.The New Cult Canon: I am Cuba. The A.V. Club, May 1. 2008. It was thought to be a lost movie until being re-discovered in 1994. The movie is shot in black and white. ==References== Category:1964 drama movies Category:Cuban movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Soviet culture Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: I Am Cuba
